column4: why is there no good gtk apps? a lot are for kde, it seems. do devs like kde more? not to flame, just curious becaue i was thinking of using gnome for a change
depends on what apps you are wanting.   I mixx and match kde/gnome  apps depending on the task i am doing.

i just like consistency. not really in favor of one over the other. i don't think it's too much to ask anymore to install both gtk and kde apps and not have them look like crap anymore next to each other
i dont really notice them looking like crap.. really I dont even notice which apps are gnome and which are kde.  I do enable those 'use gnome themes on kde apps and visa versa' tools.
